Good instrvctions for all youngmen and maids being the substance of an excellent sermon preached at St. Stevens Colmanstreet the 8 day of March 1641 : at the earnest request of divers youngmen and apprentices at a solemne thanksgiving and celebration of a fast / by Samuel Burrowes. Burrowes, Samuel, 17th cent.
[2], 13 p.
for T. B. ..., Printed at London : 1642.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
=======
